Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a stretch of road leading east
This stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) leads to the east. $(parent-desc)
a pair of heavy iron-barred wooden doors leading north
A pair of heavy iron-barred wooden doors outfitted with an impressive portcullis leads to the north. $(parent-desc)
a narrow stretch of road leading northwest
This narrow stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) leads to the northwest. $(parent-desc)
a stretch of road leading south
This stretch of $(this.trait:road:name) leads to the south. $(parent-desc)

An elaborate set of worn, dew-dampened dry rain-soaked rain-drenched wet damp dewy cool, damp dewy sun-warmed dry hot, dusty dry, dusty rain-drenched rain-soaked wet dew-dampened cool, damp sun-warmed warm dry dewy cool, damp damp, dewy snowy, frost-covered snow-swept icy, snow-covered completely snow-covered snow-blanketed heavily snowed over icy, snow-covered thickly snow-covered snowy, iced-over limestone steps that lead towards the expansive courtyard of the Citadel.

"The building to the west towers high overhead, with an enormous pair of hunter green doors which reaches nearly to the structure's top story. As the highest point in the city, the rooftops seem to cascade and tumble ever downward to hug the waters of the bay beyond, providing sweeping views of the whole of Rinascita to the south. "
